name: id3-rw
description: Insanely quick ID3 reading & writing for JavaScript powered by WebAssembly.

scripts.preversion: cd .. && git diff --exit-code && git diff --cached --exit-code && make setup && make test
scripts.version: cd .. && make setup && git add . && git commit -m "version: Bump version to $npm_package_version " && git tag -a v$npm_package_version -m "Bump version to $npm_package_version "
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
